mean_cn: n. 网，网状物；  adj. 纯利的，净值的，净的
mean_en: a type of material that is made of string, thread or wire twisted or tied together, with small spaces in between; (especially in compounds) a piece of net used for a particular purpose, such as catching fish or covering something; (in sports) the frame covered in net that forms the goal
sentence: The football was kicked into the net.
